import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Page, Text, View, Document, StyleSheet, Image, } from '@react-pdf/renderer'; import { PDFViewer } from '@react-pdf/renderer'; import axios from 'axios'; export default class PrintOrdre extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { numOrdre: "",// nom d'expert NomPrenom:"", Qualification:"", dateDebut:"", dateFin:"", dureeVisite:"", qualificationExigees:"", lieuMission:"", client:"", etendue:"", materiels:"", lieu:"", mobilisation:"", logement:"", demobilisation:"", } } // get data from data base componentDidMount () { axios.get("/missionsList/" + this.props.id ).then(res => this.setState({ ...res.data // obtenir toutes variables de la base de donnés et les envoyer au constructor } ))} render() { return (
Numéro d'ordre {this.state.numOrdre} Inspecteur Nom et Prénom Inspecteur {this.state.NomPrenom} Qualification {this.state.Qualification} Détails de la misssion date de debut {this.state.dateDebut} date de fin {this.state.dateFin} Durée de la visite {this.state.dureeVisite} qualification éxigées {this.state.qualificationExigees} Détails dy projet {/* Product Type Period Price React-PDF 3 2019-02-20 - 2020-02-19 5€ Another row Capítulo I: Que trata de la condición y ejercicio del famoso hidalgo D. Quijote de la Mancha 2019-05-20 - 2020-07-19 25€ */}
) } } const styles = StyleSheet.create({ body: { padding: 10 }, table: { justifyContent:"flex-start", display: "table", width: "auto", borderStyle: "solid", borderColor: '#bfbfbf', borderWidth: 1, borderRightWidth: 1, borderBottomWidth: 1 }, tableRow: { margin: "auto", flexDirection: "row" , width:"100%" }, // tableColHeader: { // width: "25%", // borderStyle: "solid", // borderColor: '#bfbfbf', // borderBottomColor: '#000', // borderWidth: 1, // borderLeftWidth: 1, // borderTopWidth: 1 // }, tableCol: { width: "25%", borderStyle: "solid", borderColor: 'black', borderWidth: 1, borderLeftWidth: 1, borderTopWidth: 1 , }, tableColl: { width: "25%", borderStyle: "solid", borderColor: 'black', borderWidth: 1, borderLeftWidth: 1, borderTopWidth: 1 , backgroundColor:"#1A73E8" }, tableCellHeader: { margin: "auto", margin: 5, fontSize: 12, fontWeight: 500, }, tableCell: { margin: "auto", margin: 5, fontSize: 10 }, image: { marginVertical: 25, marginHorizontal: 10, width:150, height:55, }, });
